docs.text: at the outset of swordfish , john travolta's gabriel shear is pontificating about the status of american cinema today .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: basically , he says , it boils down to a lack of imagination among the majority of writers .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: how ironic , as travolta seems to be describing his latest venture .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: swordfish is loud , violent and amoral .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it has the audacity to justify murder and mayhem in the name of sustaining our way of life .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and how does travolta's gabriel plan to do this ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: by robbing billions from his own government and using the funds to out-terrorize terrorists .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: swordfish is a very cynical movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it relies on an audience's perception of our leaders as ineffectual and duplicitous and on terrorists as non-human , faceless entities not worthy of compassion or consideration .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the movie's plot is preposterous with enough illogical leaps that if the film ever slowed down , you'd actually see how ridiculous it all is .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is a live-action road runner cartoon , moving so quickly that it's over before you can catch your breath to ask any reasonable questions .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the storyline revolves around super hacker stanley jobson ( hugh jackman ) , recruited by gabriel to crack the government's computer codes so gabriel can gather billions for his anti-terrorist campaign .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: talk about whacked-out patriotism .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: my objections to swordfish are many .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the body count is high , but that is expected in a movie of this sort .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's becoming a bore watching anonymous soldiers , police officers and government agents blown to bits .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: another example is the family dynamics between stanley , his 10-year-old daughter and his ex-wife .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: stanley , though having served time in prison for hacking , is shown as a loving and caring father , forbidden by his ex to see his little girl .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: audience animosity is immediately created for his former spouse by showing her as a drinker and smoker who also sometimes stars in her new husband's adult films .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: thus when she is found murdered late in the movie , neither stanley nor his daughter are allowed any time to grieve .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in fact , subconsciously , many in the audience are probably glad she was killed .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: then there is the sequence involving one of gabriel's henchman holding a gun to the head of stanley's daughter to coerce the hacker to download the key computer program for gabriel .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: children as pawns have become a most unwelcome clich ? in recent films .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there is enough violence in the real world involving children without having to make them on-screen victims as well .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: yea , it's only make believe , but that doesn't mean you have to tolerate it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: travolta is cool , deadly charming and flamboyant as the near-crazy gabriel .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his character is reminiscent of his villainous characterizations in broken arrow and face/off .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: jackman looks dour through most of the proceedings .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his only moment of any depth comes when he finally is able to create the worm to get inside the government database .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his sense of joy and accomplishment is one any computer whiz can appreciate .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: halle berry is decorative and lovely as gabriel's assistant , while don cheadle is given little to do as the head fbi agent hunting gabriel .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: swordfish plays like a comic book with a larger-than-life character in gabriel .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: viewers align themselves with him despite their uncertainty if he is hero or villain .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and maybe that is the movie's underlying flaw : there is no real hero to speak of , only those doing their upmost to survive .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and that is not enough .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is one swordfish that should have been thrown back in the water .
docs.label: negative
